title: Highest grossing Hollywood actors of all time in the U.S. 2019
yAxis: Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Samuel L. Jackson and lowest at Month Mark Ruffalo.
The highest Month Samuel L. Jackson has 3343.1 more Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Mark Ruffalo.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The maximum Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars 7107.8 is found at Month Samuel L. Jackson and the minimum is found at Mark Ruffalo where Month is 3764.7.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Samuel L. Jackson and lowest at Month Mark Ruffalo.
The highest Month Samuel L. Jackson has 3343.1 more Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Mark Ruffalo.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars 7107.8 is found at Month Samuel L. Jackson and the minimum is found at Mark Ruffalo where Month is 3764.7.
The highest Month Samuel L. Jackson has 3343.1 more Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Mark Ruffalo.
Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars at Month Samuel L. Jackson is 7107.8 , second place is Robert Downey Jr. at 5818.8, and thirdly is Scarlett Johannsson at 5244.1.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars has reduced over the past 20 Months.
Considered together, the average Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars in all 20 Months is roughly 4500.83.
